name: 教育統計
goals: Can develop greater understanding of basic concepts and various statistical methods uti-lized in scientific research, particularly in teaching Chinese as a second/foreign language
Can select, conduct appropriate statistical methods through the use of a computer software package and interpret the results
Can apply statistical concepts and methods to instructional and research work and evaluate authentic information encountered in daily life
